story-moment.MOURNING FOR GROOT: Rocket mourned the loss of Groot when his friend sacrificed himself to save his teammates.
story-moment.STEALING BATTERIES: After taking a job to save valuable batteries belonging to Sovereign, Rocket then couldn’t resist stealing some of those same batteries for himself – sending the Sovereign after the Guardians.
story-moment.LOCKED UP WITH YONDU: Rocket was locked up alongside Yondu by Ravagers but with Groot and Kraglin’s help broke out and struck back at their enemies.
story-moment.CREATING A WEAPON: Rocket volunteered himself and Groot to join Thor on his journey to create a new weapon to battle Thanos.

powers+abilities.EXPERT ENGINEER: Rocket is a highly intelligent engineer and is particularly adept when it comes to improvised devices and weaponry.
powers+abilities.SKILLED MARKSMAN: Rocket is a skilled marksman and is able to expertly use weapons of varied background and design.
powers+abilities.ACCOMPLISHED PILOT: Rocket is an accomplished pilot, having proven his worth in both escape and combat scenarios - while continuing a rivalry with Peter Quill about who is the best.
powers+abilities.AGILITY: Rocket is notably strong for his size and highly agile, able to take on multiple opponents within moments.

bio.EYES: Brown (sometimes varies due to tapetal reflection)
